Title: Unemployment rate (all working age)
Note: People aged 16-64, unemployed as at Mar-May 2024 (seasonally adjusted)

Title: Economic inactivity rate (all working age)
Note: People aged 16-64, economically inactive as at Mar-May 2024 (seasonally adjusted)

Title: Unemployment rate (young people)
Note: Young people aged 16-24, unemployed as at Mar-May 2024 (seasonally adjusted)

Title: Economic inactivity rate (young people)
Note: Young people aged 16-24, economically inactive as at Mar-May 2024 (seasonally adjusted)

Title: Unemployment rate (Not in full-time education)
Note: Young people aged 16-24, not in full-time education, unemployed as at Mar-May 2024 (seasonally adjusted)

Title: Economic inactivity rate (Not in full-time education)
Note: Young people aged 16-24, not in full-time education, economically inactive as at Mar-May 2024 (seasonally adjusted)

Title: Long-term unemployment rate 6 to 12 months
Note: Young people aged 16-24, unemployed between 6 and 12 months as at Mar-May 2024 (seasonally adjusted)

Title: Long-term unemployment rate over 12 months
Note: Young people aged 16-24, unemployed over 12 months as at Mar-May 2024 (seasonally adjusted)
